attractions.title: Vidhana Soudha
attractions.description: The majestic seat of Karnataka’s state legislature, known for its stunning Dravidian architecture.

attractions.title: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
attractions.description: A sprawling 240-acre garden with exotic plants, a glasshouse, and serene lakes.

attractions.title: Bangalore Palace
attractions.description: A royal palace with Tudor-style architecture and lavish interiors, offering a glimpse into Bangalore’s history.

attractions.title: Cubbon Park
attractions.description: A lush green oasis in the heart of the city, perfect for leisurely walks and cultural events.

attractions.title: ISKCON Temple
attractions.description: A serene spiritual center dedicated to Lord Krishna, known for its beautiful architecture and vibrant festivals.

attractions.title: Commercial Street
attractions.description: A bustling shopping hub offering everything from traditional handicrafts to modern fashion.
